description: From Latin refulgentem, accusative singular of refulgēns, present active participle of refulgeō, from re- (“back”) + fulgeō (“shine”).

adjectives.description: refulgent (comparative more refulgent, superlative most refulgent)

entries.meaning: Resplendent, or shining brightly and radiantly.
(figuratively) As if giving off light or warmth.
